infos.value: Brother... What are we going to do now?
But those mines are the pits of hell themselves. They claim your humanity...and then your life.
We're not going to end up like that... We're going to live, both of us.
You just don't get it, do you?
Or did you actually think you'd given them the slip?
You'd do well not to underestimate the soldiers of Fennes.
In any case, you won't be able to wander around dressed like that... Put these on.
Well then, let's see if you've got the mettle to back up this third option you've brought to the table.
